name: Oracle Trials
description:
Oracle Trials is action-packed 2D platformer with cute vector-art visuals combined with splendid particle effects and animations. The story is set into the Ancient Greek world full of gods and myths. The main theme revolves around the Oracle, which was robbed of its treasures and power by Evil Phalanx warriors.
In its last utterance, the Oracle designated you (the Player) as the only hope for saving the mankind. As a king of the small, petty, Greek city state, you are perplexed by the choice, yet all the more determined to prove, it is a right one.
Each level explores some attributes of ancient Gods and myths, the curious player will be given chance to learn more about oracles, its meaning in the past and even the relation to these days. The goal is clear: Restore the Oracle's power and overthrow the evil forces!
